successes.title: Barbell Denim: Functional denim has arrived.
successes.description: Premium denim made for your active lifestyle. Finally jeans that go where you go and move how you move.

Pledges.description: Not only will you receive an over the web high five, we'll hand-write you a thank you card showing our undying gratitude for your support and throw in an awesome Barbell Apparel Shirt!
The early bird. One pair of premium designed in Las Vegas Barbell Denim jeans. This package also includes a hand written thank you letter to show our gratitude for your support.
The basic. This package includes one pair of our premium designed In Las Vegas Barbell Denim jeans.
The Plus. One pair of premium Barbell Denim and an awesome tri-blend Barbell Apparel t-shirt.
The deluxe. This package includes two pairs of our premium Barbell Denim jeans & a limited edition tri-blend Barbell Apparel shirt.
The superior. Includes three pairs of our premium Barbell Denim jeans. You will also receive a limited edition Barbell Apparel Shirt.
The ultimate. Five pairs of our premium denim in any size you want. This will also include a Barbell Apparel Shirt and a permanent thank you on our website.
The Elite. Ten pairs of our premium denim in any size you want & ten premium Barbell Apparel t-shirts. Perfect for groups or the die-hard supporter!
